title: How Does the Most Compatible Feature Work on Hinge?

steps.title: The Most Compatible algorithm pairs people who are most likely to match.
steps.content: The Most Compatible algorithm pairs people who are most likely to match. Hinge notes that these recommendations are based on mutual Dealbreakers, as well as recent activity. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Your Most Compatible profile will appear atop your deck each day.
steps.content: Your Most Compatible profile will appear atop your deck each day. Hinge tends to make your Most Compatible profile the first one you see each day, so long as you are using the main Compatible feed. [2] X Research source Look for the purple tile atop the page that notes Most Compatible...we think you two should meet. Tap the encircled question mark in the upper-right corner of the purple box to read more about Hinge's Most Compatible feature.

steps.title: Both users will see the Most Compatible notification.
steps.content: Both users will see the Most Compatible notification. Hinge puts a Most Compatible profile in both users' decks. This presents double the opportunity for a like to be sent, as either user can send a like to the other. Most Compatible profiles are not guaranteed to match. Both users must still agree to match like any other set of users, but Hinge does deem it to be more likely.

steps.title: Hinge relies on the Gale-Shapley algorithm to curate its suggestions.
steps.content: Hinge relies on the Gale-Shapley algorithm to curate its suggestions. The Gale-Shapley algorithm is a mathematical solution to the "Stable Marriage Problem". Essentially, the algorithm is designed to improve its matching ability as more and more data becomes available. [3] X Research source You may not be pleased with your Most Compatible suggestions at first, but extended use of the app will allow Hinge to better understand your activity and preferences. Eventually, your Most Compatible suggestions should gel with your dating interests. The algorithm learns from the following information: Your preferences and Dealbreakers Your activity within the app (who you like, who you pass on, who you message, etc.) Your profile info (including your answers to the three prompts) Who likes and interacts with your profile

steps.title: Use the "We Met" feature to improve your Most Compatible suggestions.
steps.content: Use the "We Met" feature to improve your Most Compatible suggestions. After messaging a user for an extended period of time, you will have the option to notify Hinge if you have met this user in person yet. You may answer Yes , Not Yet , or No . An honest answer will help Hinge better tailor your recommendations. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Hinge claims that Most Compatible profiles are 8x more likely to go on a first date.
steps.content: Hinge claims that Most Compatible profiles are 8x more likely to go on a first date. Hinge is confident in its Most Compatible feature, as suggested by this statistic. [5] X Research source Even if you are not immediately infatuated with a Most Compatible recommendation, consider sending a like and starting a conversation ! You may be surprised by just how compatible you are.

steps.title: Hinge Most Compatible suggestions are only as good as the data provided.
steps.content: Hinge Most Compatible suggestions are only as good as the data provided. If you find yourself disappointed or surprised by your Most Compatible recommendations, consider updating your profile . These recommendations pull from various aspects of your profile, so you may want to present yourself differently if you are looking for a different kind of user than the ones suggested to you. [6] X Research source
